page.title: 15HOBBIES IN CHURCHILL
page.content: Painting is one of the most popular arts, with several artists in the village using oils, water colours and acrylic paints. Their subjects are landscapes, animals and still lifes. Another popular hobby is hand knitting, using pure wool, nylons and other man made fibres or a mixture of these, making a variety of garments and using varied patterns ranging from very simple to very complicated. Crochet is also a pastime using similar fibres to hand knitting. Embroidery, tapestry, dressmaking, wallhangings, patchwork and collage are all forms of needlework which are widely practised. Evening classes in the nearby town cater for adults wishing to learn lace making and woodwork. These are patronised by several residents of the village.
